page.title: 01FARM MACHINERY
page.content:
{The plough}is used to dig up the ground ready to be drilled. The seeds are planted when{the drill}is used. Then the{sprayers}spray it for three months. When the seeds have grown the {combine}comes and cuts the crop. The {rake}comes to rake the stubble after which the{bailer}comes to make the bales.{The tractor and trailer}removes the bales from the fields and the stubble is burnt.
They grow the grass, then a{forage {harvester}comes and picks up all the grass and chops it into tiny pieces. Then a specialy designed trailer comes to collect all the tiny pieces which are coming out of the spout of the forage harvester.{
